bibl.title: Jewish Oath in Ptolemaic Egypt.
When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday

bibl.note: ""This is an expanded version of a part of my speech presented at the ceremony of renewal of my doctorate by the University of Warsaw on June 6, 2011."" - Text, translation and commentary of P. Polit. Iud. 9.
bibl.seg: Joseph Modrzejewski (Mélèze Modrzejewski), Jewish Oath in Ptolemaic Egypt.

David M. Schaps, Uri Yiftach & Daniela Dueck (edd.), When West Met East. The Encounter of Greece and Rome with the Jews, Egyptians, and Others. Studies Presented to Ranon Katzoff in Honor of his 75th Birthday = Graeca Tergestina. Storia e Civiltà. 3 (Trieste, 2016) pp. 169-177.

""This is an expanded version of a part of my speech presented at the ceremony of renewal of my doctorate by the University of Warsaw on June 6, 2011."" - Text, translation and commentary of P. Polit. Iud. 9.
